    • Uses of MessagingRuntimeException in fr.sii.ogham.core.exception.util

      Subclasses of MessagingRuntimeException in fr.sii.ogham.core.exception.util 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BeanWrapperException
      General exception that is thrown when trying to wrap a bean for accessing its properties.
      class  FieldAccessException
      Ogham provides some utility functions.
      class  InvalidPropertyException
      This specialized exception indicates that a particular property of a bean couldn't be accessed either because the property doesn't exist or because the property has no getter or the property access is denied.

    • Uses of MessagingRuntimeException in fr.sii.ogham.template.exception

      Subclasses of MessagingRuntimeException in fr.sii.ogham.template.exception 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ResolverAdapterNotFoundException
      Specialized exception that is thrown by template engine integration (can't use a checked exception) in order to wrap a ResolverAdapterException.
      class  TemplateRuntimeException
      This exception is a RuntimeException and is useful when no checked exception can be thrown.

    • Uses of MessagingRuntimeException in fr.sii.ogham.template.thymeleaf.common.exception

      Subclasses of MessagingRuntimeException in fr.sii.ogham.template.thymeleaf.common.exception 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  TemplateResolutionException
      Specialized exception that is thrown by template engine integrations to indicate that a template couldn't be resolved.
